places.name: Temple Square
places.address: 50 North Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84150
places.description: A beautiful area where the Salt Lake Temple stands.

places.name: Utah State Capitol
places.address: 350 State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84114
places.description: This is the state capitol of Utah. A wide area with tall hills, it is also a bit like a park to visit.

places.name: Clark Planetarium
places.description: The main planetarium in Utah, it is the successor to the Hansen Planetarium. A wonderful location that everyone should visit and learn about the universe in many kinds of interactive areas! Check out the amazing lazer shows and Imax videos.

places.name: Utah Hogle Zoo
places.address: 2600 Sunnyside Ave S, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
places.description: With its origins established in 1911, the Utah Hogle Zoo has stood in its current location since 1931. Many animals can be found here!

places.name: This Is The Place Heritage Park
places.address: 2601 Sunnyside Ave S, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
places.description: Including various historical sites, this park marks the area where the saints entered the Salt Lake valley.

places.name: Utah State Fairpark
places.address: 155 N 1000 W, Salt Lake City, UT 84116

places.name: The Gateway
places.address: 400 W 200 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84101
places.description: A large mall with open-air access between shops, it is a great location to visit, browse, and shop.

places.name: The Great Salt Lake (Visitor Center)
places.description: Big, wet, and salty. Though it has lost much of its former glory to the passage of time and both social and environmental changes, it is still a major location of Utah. It remains a popular attraction, with many boaters and gliders enjoying the area. The visitor center is found near the main parking area for visiting the lakeshor.
